# GitHub Issues

This directory contains issue templates and documentation for creating GitHub issues.

## How to Use

1. Open the markdown file for the issue you want to create
2. Copy the entire contents
3. Go to your GitHub repository
4. Click "New Issue"
5. Paste the contents into the issue description
6. Fill in any additional details or labels as needed
7. Submit the issue

## Issue Files

- `guild-tracker-processing-toggle.md` - Backend implementation for guild-level tracker processing toggle
